module.name: fpg_colormapping
module.short: This unit contains some color conversion/mapping functions.

element.name: RGBToHSV
element.short: Map RGB colorspace to HSV colorspace.
element.descr: This function converts a RGB (Red, Green, Blue) colorspace value to HSV (Hue, Saturation, Value) colorspace. The parameters have specific value ranges. Please see the parameter documentation for more details.

element.name: HSVToRGB
element.short: Map HSV colorspace to RGB colorspace.

element.name: RGBToHSV.Hue
element.descr: The Hue range is from 0 - 1535. In that range, the primary colors are mapped to the following values. Red = 0. Green = 512 and Blue = 1024.

element.name: RGBToHSV.Saturation
element.descr: The Saturation value range is from 0.0 - 1.0. Grey (no color) = 0. Maximum color = 1.0.

element.name: RGBToHSV.Value
element.descr: The Value value range is from 0.0 to 1.0. Black being 0 and maximum brightness being 1.0.
